mapper.select: SELECT it_itemno as itItemNo, user_id as userId, filepath as profileFilePath, nickname as nickName, it_title as itItemTitle, it_content as itContent, reg_date as postTime, item_code as categoryCode, item_name as categoryName, brand as brand, it_name as itName, it_color as itColor, it_size as itSize, user_height as userHeight, user_size as userSize, hashtag as hashtag, del_YN as delYN FROM( SELECT I.*, FILEPATH, NICKNAME, ITEM_NAME FROM IT_ITEM I LEFT JOIN MEMBER_IMG MI ON (MI.USER_ID=I.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID=I.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY IC ON (I.ITEM_CODE=IC.ITEM_CODE)) WHERE IT_ITEMNO=#{itItemNo}
SELECT it_itemno as itItemNo, filepath as filePath FROM IT_IMG WHERE IT_ITEMNO=#{itItemNo}

SELECT ititem_post_no as itItemNo, cmt_no as cmtNo, cmt_writer as cmtWriter, cmt_content as cmtContent, cmt_parent as cmtParent, cmt_depth as cmtDepth, cmt_seq as cmtSEQ, del_YN as cmtDelYN, cmt_time as cmtTime, nickname as nickName, filepath as profileFilePath FROM ITITEM_COMMENTS IC LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID=IC.cmt_writer) LEFT JOIN MEMBER_IMG MI ON (MI.USER_ID=IC.cmt_writer) WHERE ititem_post_no=#{itItemNo} AND del_YN='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) as itLike FROM ITEM_LIKE GROUP BY IT_ITEMNO HAVING IT_ITEMNO=#{itItemNo}
SELECT COUNT(*)as itScrap FROM ITEM_SCRAP GROUP BY IT_ITEMNO HAVING IT_ITEMNO=#{itItemNo}
select it_ItemNo as itItemNo from item_like where user_Id=#{userId}
select it_ItemNo as itItemNo from item_scrap where user_Id=#{userId}
